post.body: you should draw us a picture so we can all awe at it from afar. That'd be spastic if that makes sense.
lmao, nice pictures ;] and I'm glad your dog made it through :D also, keep up the good work with everything! :]
You inspire me Mr. Toro! You and your crazy guitar skills, how do you do it?! :D
http://twitpic.com/t9za - As we can see, Gee was attracted to his blood that he goes and takes a picture of it, haha. :]
http://twitpic.com/t9za - I'm going to guess that there was no pick around, and the strings clearly caught on his skin etc. B ...
AH! hello, how has life been? I hope everything's been good and dandy. You deserve a good day/week!
-pst- you're loads fun to draw than the other guys. Don't tell them I told you, haha. Nah, you all rock.
Guess what! I'm drawing a picture of you, and coloring it. It's a pic from the revenge era, and you're all like: -gasp!- :o
oooh, NJ to LA...long ways. Tells Gee to move closer so you aren't so tired anymore! Haha. I hope you live in NJ not LA!
yes they did that on purpose! TWITTER IS SICK! hahaha.
YES! I love the umbrella academy. It inspired me to write my own comics, but the plot keeps messin things up! Help please? :/
oh god, i hate winter already though it's still fall? I dont care, I want spring! Damn the snow and cold.
http://twitpic.com/qzq2 - holy shit dude, that's awesome. Nice armour and all, and nice weapon. Do you have the new 'ga ...
gah, can't go see them ever cause Iowa gets no good bands, EVER. MSI was in Iowa but it was on a school day :( so no.
have you ever played the Saga dreamcast in your life? I wanted to today, but i couldn't find it! I wanna play Sonic Adventure 2.GAH
you rock at photography, haha. Happy christmas :]
Happy christmas!
happy christmas
happy christmas!!
wow, huge dog! He seems friendly :] Happy christmas!
I'm glad you had fun with the boys :D Merry x-mas to you to!
loves the bass, tis amazing.
feel better! Happy xmas to you to!
i know how you feel man, i know how you feel. Haha.
you are surely skilled my man. And where are you in the game place area? And where can I go to play there!? I'd be in heaven!!
As a child, I was sick a lot, and when I got older the sickness died down. Now, I'm home sick since my sicknesses are worse than usual. Damn
Is drawing Frank, and needs to finish To Kill a Mocking Bird
Has the biggest fucking headache!!! AHHHH it hurts....maybe it's my contacts, I NEED NEW ONES!
Run away with me? Anytime you want.
sneezing, ick. Going to get some dessert mommy made, and probably draw like she always does. Or play guitar. No dreamcast tonight :(((
The misfits are AWESOME! But now I'm moving on to A7X, they're temporary keeping me sane until MCR comes out with new music. I love them!
my throat hurts and it's annoying :(
